about_the_game:
Face series of battles defending the good people against the force of evil. Fight together with the three heroes and together with various of fighters and spells combined. Together craft a strategy and action with various situations.
This is a single player gameplay with blend of action and strategy, with a point of view side scrolling defending game. Defeat the series of various enemies, each enemies bring different character and ways to defeat them. Fight against unique bosses through at the climax situation.

Heroes
Heroes possess abilities that players can choose to adapt to their play style and the battle's situation. Create synergy among all three available heroes, maximizing their combined potential. As the story progresses, heroes unlock new, collectible equipment. Players have direct control over the heroes, selecting and using their abilities, adding dynamic action to the gameplay.

Fighters
Fighters join the battle, standing alongside you in the fight. These brave individuals believe in heroic action, supporting from a distance and on the front lines. Strategically positioning these fighters and utilizing their unique classes creates a synergistic defense system.

Magic
Spells that can turn the tide of battle are at the player’s disposal. Each spell has unique characteristics, allowing players to select the most effective ones based on the situation. Whether buffing allies or destroying enemies, these spells play a crucial role in enhancing overall defense. The right combination of spells can create powerful synergies on the battlefield.

Main Story
Players immerse themselves in the story, becoming part of the Aeon World—a fantasy realm where classic battles of good versus evil are waged, filled with magic and mystery. The story centers around the defense of Fort Burton, a legendary city that once withstood an immense evil power in ancient times. After a long period of peace, dark forces have risen again, invading from within and wreaking havoc on the people. Yet, heroes emerge to bring hope and stand against the dark power, fighting to protect the city and its inhabitants.

Extra Play (coming soon)
This is considered high-end gameplay, offering players the joy with content gradually added over time. This includes features like endless mode, additional storylines, unique gameplay experiences, and much more.

name: Defense Of Fort Burton

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3300x or Intel Core i3-10100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet for leaderboard and achievement only.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X or Intel Core i5-9600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet for leaderboard and achievement only.

short_description: The battle awaits—defend your loved ones with strategy and tactics as you face waves of enemies in action-packed combat. Command three heroes to fight alongside the brave defenders of Fort Burton, and harness magic to experience the ultimate strategic defense in this epic confrontation.
